WorkItem.Description:
Problem: NetOffice v1.4.1 throws an InvalidCastException when trying to get the values of NetOffice.OutlookApi.ContactItem.Gender because the Gender property tries to cast an Int16 value to OlGender enum which defaults to Int32. The above problem surfaced when Outlook2003 was used.
Â 
Solution: Change the declaration of OlGender 
from: public enum OlGender
to: public enum OlGender : short
